721643f-a.text: 103, 105 Mercer Street, adjoining the frame house at the N.W. corner of Spring Street (see 107 Spring Street).  April 29, 1934.  P. L. Sperr.
721643f-a.folder: Mercer Street & Spring Street, Manhattan, NY

723366f-a.text:
1)
107 Spring Street - 101 Mercer Street, a frame house at the N.W. corner, faced with brick on the Spring Street side.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Mueeum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 552.
(2)
The same, a slightly later view.
April 29, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
